website_summaries.verdict: Since krill oil is easily absorbed into your cat’s system, kitty’s coat will receive more essential nutrients per supplement than your average fish oil-based recipe.
pros: Krill oil promotes a healthier and shinier coat
cons: Although we appreciate its impressive coat health formula, it would be nice to get more than 60 chews for the price

customer_reviews.title: Look at photos for ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: These sound like really good treats, but I won't be able to give them to my diabetic cat--they're full of starch. The list of ingredients in the ad is just the "active" ones--the package also lists rice bran, starch, glycerin, synthetic cheese flavor, lecithin, safflower oil, vitamin E, ascorbic acid, calcium, and natural red coloring. They come in at 43% on the cat food carb calculator I pulled the numbers into. I have just realized that you can see the full ingredient list if you click on the pictures--I just relied on the main text of the ad and didn't think to look there.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: recommending to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs,, relatively short hair, but they still shed, and when I brushed them the hair was constant! I have been using this for the past 2 months and have seen a remarkable difference! I recently purchased a container for a friend of mine who complains about her dogs' shedding which is out of control no matter how much they brush them. I'm hoping this works for them too! I'll keep you posted! But feel confident that it will help as much as it's helped my dogs! thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A White

customer_reviews.title: Finally, something that worked for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been going crazy for years, Fall through Spring chewing and biting at her hind quarters. We tried prescription meds, the pills, powders, liquids and nothing helped. This was going to be the last shot. Oddly enough, They Work! She is not bothered by whatever was driving her and US nuts in the past. She is a 40 lb mixed breed and we give her 1 chew in the mornings. and life is good. Extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: She loved them, but she was itching herself so bad ...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to rate this due to our dog is allergic to these. She loved them, but she was itching herself so bad she was tearing her skin. I was hoping it was just something else, we took her to the vet to clear her skin then waited an extra week then tried it again, we had to stop within 2days due to reactions. She is a Mastiff. The only reason I'm writing this is because I didn't read any reviews about allergic reactions, and thought it was in my head. Although I think in most circumstances it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Chews!
customer_reviews.text: Started feeding these to my german shepherd and within 3 weeks I barely even have to swift. It's incredible! I was vacuuming twice a day and still there was hair floating around, these chews save so much time. The only down side is the tub only lasts about 1-2 months for a 60 lb dog. Other than that they're absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Gave my 6 year old dog diarrhea all night.
customer_reviews.text: This was the only thing I added to her diet and she's been miserable. Sure, I guess could be a bad batch or a bad reaction, but now I'm stuck staying up til 5am waiting on my dog, who lives in my apartment, to continue taking drippy dumps. Sorry, not recommended. Also she didn't initially think it was very appetizing. I had to coax her into eating one.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: First chewabl pill that Prince Wally will actually chew. :)
customer_reviews.text: It has only been a week since the Antarctic Krill Soft Chews arrived. We think they are working but need another week or so to really give them an opportunity to get into his system. I will say, this is the first "chewable" pill that Wally will actually chew! Every other pill advertised as "chewable" has to be cut up and hidden in cheese for Prince Wally. Not that he is spoiled! I'll update this post in a few week to say how well it is working.
customer_reviews.author: MidSouth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a week so far and the results are amazing. I bought this for our older dog. He is a 13 year old Jack Russell terroir and had a itching issue which would result in nawwed skin and blood. After trying multiple shampoos and ointments this was my last hope. As of today he has all his energy back doesn’t itch anymore and he smells better and also his coat is so soft. I would recommend this to anyone who’s dog/pup is sleeping a lot, itching, shedding bad or has a dry coat.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it! Return policy Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates these dog chews, no matter what I tried, I mixed it with his favorite can food he would not eat it all day long. I tried for days. As for the return, I would have to drive quite far in heavy traffic to a Amazon location to return it for free. I bought this through Prime. But for some reason I have to pay $5.99 to drop it off at UPS or USPS, what gives?
customer_reviews.author: Spirit Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Got these for our dog after our vet recommended getting an omega 3 supplement for him
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our dog after our vet recommended getting an omega 3 supplement for him. We used them every day and he LOVED them - ate them like treats. About a month into daily use, he started vomiting them up. He wouldn't puke up anything but this treat. Unfortunately we have had to find another product, but when he was using this we did notice a huge reduction in his itchiness!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Red dye put me off plus having to cut in half for weight of pups.  Will not order again.
customer_reviews.text: Pups like them ok. I have two 12 lb pups so have to cut each one in half according to dosage. They tend to crumble when cutting so aggravating. Also, I didn’t take the picture at face value to notice the red color as a result of adding red dye. Why add color? I gave 2 stars but will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Akgal

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to see how it impacts her scratching.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the directions call for dividing the item in halfs and quarters based on weight of the pup, but that the chews fall apart in doing so makes it difficult to use till the dog is of adequate size to eat a whole one. As we just began using them, don't know if they impact her scratching due to allergies yet.
customer_reviews.author: Don159

customer_reviews.title: Very good for dogs skin
customer_reviews.text: My dog was having trouble with very dry skin and hair and source because he was scratching. Within two weeks of starting the true krill his coat was so much better and the stores were all gone. It has not however helped with the shedding
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Miracle for My Dog
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I decided to try this! One of my dogs is getting old and could hardly walk because of arthritis in his hip and leg. We saw a difference right away and now he walks around and actually ran outside the other day! This has been a miracle product for us and we would recommend it highly for older dogs....preferably before arthritis sets in like in our "baby'!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Devillier

customer_reviews.title: Crumbling treat!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly. My gripe is when I tried to cut it in half, as indicated for my size dog, the treat crumbled. I ended up sprinkling it on the dog food instead of using it as a treat. Made my dogs skin a bit oily, so make sure you check the amount you are giving - it is a suggested portion.
customer_reviews.author: L. Niebauer

customer_reviews.title: Very hesitant but so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended by a family friend about getting some pills for my 10 month old German Shepherd. Had seen some great reviews but skeptical. After 2 weeks of the double dosage, as the bottle states for 4 weeks, there was a huge difference in his coat. Less itching, VERY SHINY and the best part was that he wasn’t shedding as much. So if you have any doubts, try it. Your dog will love it due to its snack size. It’s a win win situation.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: I had recently given my dog these and she loved them and they helped her with allergies and itch ...
customer_reviews.text: I had recently given my dog these and she loved them and they helped her with allergies and itch control, I ordered from amazon to save a couple of bucks and boy do I regret it. I gave her these when the others ran out for a couple of days and instantly she started puking and had horrible diarrhea. A huge mess and 280 dollars at the vet later and I am in huge regret for trying to save money. I cannot even recover the money spent on these it seems. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Antonino B.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased dog owner!
customer_reviews.text: OMG THEY WORK!!! I have a white Pitt and she shedded so bad. I had to sweep my floors 3 times a day and vacuum furniture constantly. I gave these a try not really thinking they would work but they are! I started giving them to her about 2 weeks ago and her shedding has decreased to probably 70% I'm hoping the longer I give them to her it will continue to decrease the shedding but if not I'm pleased with the results I have now. I will be buying these again and telling my friends that have shedding dogs about them. Thank you for this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmyR

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that my picky little Jack Russell was not going to like the taste, but she loves them. Not sure yet how well it's helping with her itching but where giving it a try and keeping our fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately my pup didn't like the taste...
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited when I found this product because Krill Oil had been a hot topic in the beauty & health industry. I was like "Do they have that for dogs?!" and very excited to see what could do to my pup. But, my pup didn't like the taste... He only took a little little bite and never ate it again... Seems like many dogs like the taste but unfortunately it wasn't the case for my pup...
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. My blue pittie has skin problems and this has cleared her up completely in less than two weeks of use. It appears to be helping my shepherd with his knee arthritis and has slowed his shedding down quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to help with my dogs allergy sensitivity. I figure if I am going to give treats it may as well benefit her. It happens I dog sit as well. Every dog loves the chew. For a treat I cut the chews in quarters. I would love to report back in a few weeks about the allergy portion as I know it will take a while to adjust her system. I hope they make a larger quantity size.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne b.

customer_reviews.title: Probably very good, but my boy won't eat them
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give this product one star when it probably deserves 5. My dog has chronic itchy skin and I had high hopes that this product would be the answer to his skin issues. I'll never know because he won't eat them. At first I gave them to him as a treat. He sniffed it and walked away. I crumbled just one up in his food but he was onto me and wouldn't touch it. So, sadly, the search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A.

customer_reviews.title: Koko and Chikita love your product!!
customer_reviews.text: My two Chihuahuas, Koko and Chikita, like your product very very much!!! I've been giving one piece each daily for the last nine days. I've noticed their coat is better and shiny. I think there should be a bigger container to get a better deal or add a few more to the current container. :-) Great product!! Thank you!! Be safe!! Tavo
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Great "treats" my picky dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Great "treats" my picky dogs love them. With two big hairy dogs in the house I needed something to help with the shedding. Who knew a simple supplement would help so much. My only suggestion would be if you guys can make it available as a subscription I never want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: This product will store at room temperature per the label ...
customer_reviews.text: This product will store at room temperature per the label. The dose is 1/4-1/2 soft chew per day, so these will last for a really long time. My min pins gobble them right up, so I'll be reordering when the time comes. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cici Ciconia

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: Years ago I used a liquid formula to stop shedding that I can no longer find and tried this instead. I LOVE this product! It took about 2-3 weeks to take effect, and our short-hair cur is no longer shedding extra fur. Tumbleweeds of hair in the house are virtually eliminated, there' no fur on the carpet needing to be vacuumed every couple of days, and if she gets on the couch there is no longer evidence of fur left behind. This product did exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kirstin j guanciale

customer_reviews.title: Caused my dog to vomit daily
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for great results after reading so many positive reviews. Unfortunately, my dog vomited once or twice a day every day after I began giving these to her. She’s a German Shep/Rottweiler/Doberman mix. Gave her just 1/2 a day. Would be happy to mail the container to somebody who is having good results, rather than throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Holly's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: My pets wouldn't touch them. No how, no way. I gave them to my mom who has highly treat motivated dogs. They like them. She says they seem to help with dry skin. Hardly an Iver the top testimony.
customer_reviews.author: Marlie

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: All our dogs LOVE these treats -- and so does the cat. No force feeding and a lot less shedding. Have bought more and will keep all pets on these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Collins

customer_reviews.title: Shedding and itching controlled
customer_reviews.text: My Belgian Malinois had to be put on a prescription kidney diet. She’s no longer able to eat the premium kibble and food I was cooking for her. After two weeks of the prescription diet, her coat became dull and rough. She was itching and shedding horribly! After five days of this supplement, her coat and shedding is returning to normal for her breed!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! I noticed a difference in my dogs coat after about 2 weeks. She suddenly had such shiny and soft fur. She sheds CONSTANTLY and there was a drastic reduction in white fur on my chocolate brown velvet sofa. Her nails were also getting dry with the below zero temps and I noticed a difference there too. No more peeling/cracking. Also, she loves the flavor. She can be quite picky. I give these to her as a treat and they are gobbled up quickly. I am happy they are made in the USA. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: alba marie

customer_reviews.title: My girls LOVE them! They typically pick the chew out first ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a raw feeder and I am unable to give my oldest girl fish since she has mastocytoma. I decided to add Krill chews to the diet and I chose this product based on reviews and, most importantly, being made in the USA. My girls LOVE them! They typically pick the chew out first when eating and wolf it down (pun intended). Being able to add some sort of fish to their diet makes me feel better about making sure they get everything their little bodies need. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Great chews
customer_reviews.text: These chews seem great! My dog loves them, they do really help w his coat as well! I gave him a bath a few weeks after giving the chews daily and he hardly shed at all! I was so impressed and surprised because I hadn’t thought about that added benefit! These are also a good bang for your buck compared to other products, and they break apart into smaller sizes easily!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good results
customer_reviews.text: All of my dogs' fur is shiny and soft since I started giving them Tru-Krill. One of my dogs will not eat it by itself, but all will eat in their food. I crumble them on the food and mix it in.
customer_reviews.author: mooshmoopork

customer_reviews.title: Edible Says Meka B.
customer_reviews.text: Princess Fussy actually eats these with a little coaxing. They are crumbly. She is scratching less so I think they help with her dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Buy USA!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I was reluctant to use this stuff because lets face it it sounded too good to be true. But it really works!!!!! I would say shedding is down by 80%!! You really have to give it a month, twice a day to see the difference. I almost gave up! Tfy it you won't be dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great chews and healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been taking these chews for a week now and she absolutely loves them! Like goes crazy for these krill chews. I love that they're good for her and I think she's been scratching less this week than normal! I will order these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buyer
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love them and coats look good. I have a big shaggy mutt with a double coat. I can't tell if it reduced the shedding at all, but the hair that's on him and not on the floor looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are true, great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for my cat, i have a domestic short haired cat, and he's very picky so it was kind of tough getting him to eat them, i just break it in half (according to his weight) and crumble it up in his food, his coat is so shiny now, no more dandruff, much less scratching, and shedding had decreased dramatically, im a future buyer
customer_reviews.author: MsssSpence

customer_reviews.title: Premium Antarctic Krill Oil Soft Chews
customer_reviews.text: Our two Labs really like the flavor or these soft chews. I think they are a little expensive but they seem to work pretty well for my dogs. There coats are really shiny. I guess I will continue to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Hammercl

customer_reviews.title: Look Out: Even Well-Behaved Pups Will Tackle For These Chews
customer_reviews.text: We love these! These were recommended to me by a vet to assist with my German Shepherd's skin irritation. Having never tried them before, both of our dogs instantly knew the package was for them and could not WAIT for me to get it open. They both love the taste of these chews and I'm happy with the affordability of the product compared to other competing brands. I'm interested to see if a decrease in shedding will occur as a bonus "side effect." Either way, the dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: SarahBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have older mixed breed large dog and seemed shed constantly year round, but this product seems to work, and he looks forward to getting his treat each morning after his run and at night. Will keep on using it.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, but my dogs didn't like.
customer_reviews.text: It was as advertised, but my picky dogs wouldn't eat them. Tried crumbling them into their food and they wouldn't eat their food with it. Had to find alternative to get them omegas.
customer_reviews.author: Fifty150

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My cairn terriers love it. I have high hopes that it along with other vitamins, raw food diet and natural remedies, their skin allergies will lessen.
customer_reviews.author: Susie C

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my dogs every morning-they love it! I like it because I feel its a quality product-rich in Omega3's. My dogs fur is silky and shinny!
customer_reviews.author: haybull

customer_reviews.title: Worked a little.
customer_reviews.text: It hasn’t stopped The itching/scratching completely in my two dogs. Helped very little. The dogs liked them ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big difference in a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I have two long hair cattle dogs and live in a very dry climate. Softer coats within two weeks. Nails look strong and are not chipping anymore. Not as much scratching. They don't care for the taste that much but they eat them. Looking forward to seeing how things look in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Finally a non medicated way to help my favorite girl
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on these for about 8 weeks now and there has been a marked improvement in her chewing & scratching. Her coat is shiny & soft. The only negative is that when she gets hot, she has a krill smell, but I can live with that just to see her more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great krill oil tabs
customer_reviews.text: We really loved these and the only reason I switched was one of my dogs has been getting slower to move as he gets older and the weather gets cooler so I changed to one that also has a joint supplement - otherwise we would have keep getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Third purchase. Satisfied with format.
customer_reviews.text: Use to give my dogs their Omega 3’s. They love them and think they are a treat!
customer_reviews.author: Trish Brown

customer_reviews.title: Improved coat for cats
customer_reviews.text: These have been a success! Both cats, including the fairly picky one, eat them enthusiastically and there’s been no digestive upset. Dandruff in their coats has been reduced and they’re so soft! It took about a month of 1/4 chew per cat daily to notice improvement.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Good Treat
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepard lives this stuff! As for nutrition and help with her joints... I’ve noticed some improvements but can’t attribute it to this product solely.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hardmon

customer_reviews.title: My dog takes it without any hesitation
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than gel caps. no problems getting my dog to eat it. His coat has developed a new shine to it.
customer_reviews.author: da cap10

customer_reviews.title: I didn't feel like it reduced her shedding AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this product to my dog, an 80 pound golden lab, for almost two months. I didn't feel like it reduced her shedding AT ALL. I still have to brush her almost every day. If anything her fur got patchy and uneven. I personally don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NiaNia

customer_reviews.title: The dogs like the chews
customer_reviews.text: I have been supplementing the diet for about two weeks. The dogs like the chews. I cannot relate the coat improvement yet, however, I am sure there will be a noticeable difference in a couple more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: So far my 2 dogs will eat them. I dont know about the itching and hair coat because they haven't been on it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Just wish wasn't so expensive. I have 2 giant dogs, a small dog and cat. Gets very pricey. But, again great product!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Giacalone

customer_reviews.title: Can’t think of one.
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy dog loves his vitamin. He eats it first before his food.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brummett

customer_reviews.title: My Prissy girl loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Prissy has skin issues and allergies, this helps improve her coat and skin irritations.
customer_reviews.author: angelia1988

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't reduced shedding at all for us.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my dogs in a 2 a day regiment for 3 months, and their shedding has not changed at all. I've decided to stop my subscription to this product. For reference, my dogs are a lab/chow mix and a Rottweiler/standard poodle mix. They're brushed and bathed regularly.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: She doesn’t like fish BUT does enjoy these supplements
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 11 months old. These are a little too big but she still eats them. She doesn’t like fish BUT does enjoy these supplements. My suggestion for the manufacturer would be to make them smaller and suggest the serving portion be 2/day
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Finally something my picky dog will eat.
customer_reviews.text: My very picky Border Collie, who also has digestive sensitivities actually will eat these! I'd been trying to find a good fish oil supplement for him for a long time and finally found these. We are on the second tub and people already comment that his fur feels so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Denise in Boise

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this Krill oil for over a year. Our dog's coat is very soft. She gets a lot of comments as to how soft her fur feels. She loves the taste of it too. We'll definitely keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog have been on them for years. They’re doing quite well so I’ll keep purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: AZDesertDrazil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love them for my dog and she enjoys them as well
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT oils for animals!
customer_reviews.text: My Pom is 11 years old and since birth he has had skin allergies even though I always gave fish oils. But since using this, he has not had to see Vet for first time in his life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, seems to aid health, synthetic ingredient
customer_reviews.text: It was good my dog is to love it but it's strange that has synthetic ingredient which should be specified (what is that synthetic cheese flavor made of). Anyway my dog will eat it even she doesn't like most 🐕 treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of weeks our dog has finally stopped biting and scratching! We gave this every morning and mixed a little extra virgin olive oil in her dry dog food. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: arplnfxr

customer_reviews.title: but they are soft so its easy to mix with canned
customer_reviews.text: Arrived way fastee than expected, im hoping they help with my dogs coat and reduce dander and shedding, its too soon to tell, unfortunately i have to mix them with my dog food, my dogs will not eat them plain, but they are soft so its easy to mix with canned food
customer_reviews.author: Jillian E. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love taste
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs, even my very picky one, love the flavor of these “treats”. That’s how they think of them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Magic. My Poo had developed dry skin and itching, after a month using this product, her coat and skin are gorgeous. Bonus, they love it. It's their morning treat. Groomer even complimented the improvement.,
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F

customer_reviews.title: Great help for healthy pet skin
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love these and they have stopped the constant scratching. I would recommend trying them if your pet is constantly scratching and chewing themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love their Antarctic Krill.
customer_reviews.text: My scotties look forward to this “treat” every day. They run in from outside to get their krill.
customer_reviews.author: Judith G.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my dog!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a skin disease and his hair was falling out and he had a bad order then I found these and they seem to be helping his skin and coat. His hair is now growing back so I'm going to purchase some more .
customer_reviews.author: Jen 🖤

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over salmon-based products
customer_reviews.text: Our three dogs love them. Their coats and skin definitely benefit from them. Prefer over salmon-based products. Krill has minimal order as opposed to the strong fishy smell of salmon. Their breath doesn't smell anymore
customer_reviews.author: DJ Farji

customer_reviews.title: Canine approved
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs absolutely love these healthy treats every morning. Helps keep a big 16 year old dog on the move!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Work well for reducing shedding
customer_reviews.text: These treats are great. My dog likes them and they significantly reduced the amount of shedded fur in my house. Between this and daily brushing with a defurminator brush, the shedding has been reduced by at least 75%.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: it had to be VERY good for my 2 Shih Tzu's
customer_reviews.text: I know the Norwegian use Krill for humans too, and since I am from Norway, I figured, it had to be VERY good for my 2 Shih Tzu's. They share 1 pr day, and I sprinkel it on top of their breakfast. So thank you so much for bringing Krill to the marked, so our beloved Pets can get those wonderful vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvi Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Really like how easy they are to use as compared to liquid or capsules and our dogs love the taste.. Do not see any improvement in the itching that our dogs encounter, something that several people saw improvement with in their dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Melbourneite

customer_reviews.title: No difference in our dog after use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to split in two. Two stars because it has not helped our dog in the two weeks we have been using as directed. We will be going back to our old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelind Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: First time I thought it was a fluke second time I was sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be clearing up skin
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes our pup will wolf this right down, other times we mix in his food. Hard to say why - smell may be a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shedding ???
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Belgian Malinois on this product for 4 months taking two each day ... I have been hoping it would help his shedding..IT DOES NOT HELP SHEDDING!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: A must for any shedding dog!
customer_reviews.text: My lil rat terrier mix, who sheds like no other, has been on these for 3 weeks and the improvement is incredible! She's never had soft hair until now and her shedding has reduced dramatically! We'll keep these lil snacks around for sure.
customer_reviews.author: cat nash

customer_reviews.title: My dog had some trouble with her hips a few ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog had some trouble with her hips a few months back but the combination of this and Glucosamine tablets has really turned things around for her.
customer_reviews.author: burn451

customer_reviews.title: Brittle!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these and the first one out of the bag crumbled to pieces. The actual bag is not sealed with anything except a twist tie. There's no moisture or softness to them allowing you to easily break them apart. This was a complete waste of my money. Lot# 716250A
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyz

customer_reviews.title: Krill Oil Soft Chews
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start giving my dogs some added supplements to help them with healthy skin and immune system. Read about this product and thought I would try it out. It has been 8 days now and I haven't seen too much change but I will see what happens in a few more weeks
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Haines

customer_reviews.title: DOG LOVE'S THEM
customer_reviews.text: These have proven to be great my dog loves them. I was using liquid and found these, a lot less mess and more fun for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these! Such finicky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! Such finicky eaters, it's a joy to find a product that is both healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t notice much difference. Vet said it was cheaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice much difference. Vet said it was cheaper and works the same giving my pups fish oil vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them and they are from Antarctic which is only safe water left.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, but very expensive with two dogs Wish they would lower the price as I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: azdobie

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these treats
customer_reviews.text: The dogs (3) loved the treats. One of them, Bella has 6 teeth that are missing, so she can only eat soft treats. The other 2 Rocky & Bentley love them as well. At this rate I'll be buying many more. Great product, great service, Great pricing
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A.

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet girl dog loves it. It must taste good because there is no problem with her eating it. We have only been taking it for about five days now, but I will be looking for a good change in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great allergy relief for my two small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall, it really helped my two ankle buyers stop itching all the time. I would really recommend this product to anyone who loves their fur kids and hates to see them suffering from allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Helps with itchiness
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been excessively itchy for years and we've tried it all. Finally, these seem to be helping! After just a week of use she was noticeably less red and itchy and her coat is much softer.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Terry

customer_reviews.title: My male Puggle liked them but they never helped with his itching at ...
customer_reviews.text: They didn't work at all. My male Puggle liked them but they never helped with his itching at all...even when increased the suggested amount and gave him 3 a day. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: rand

customer_reviews.title: Not a return customer
customer_reviews.text: I tried these, but honestly don't think my dogs coats are benefiting. They did better with oil. Also, will stain carpet if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: MingSu

customer_reviews.title: My sheltie loves them and I am not sure if ...
customer_reviews.text: My sheltie loves them and I am not sure if her fur came in extra soft because of this or because her pups were weaned. I'm not using them every day but I will see how they work on my Cavalier now.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Itchy cockapoo.
customer_reviews.text: Bought thos cuz my dog was getting a lil bit itchy. Her skin was slightly warm and redish. So i bought this krill. My dogs itching reduced to normal and her skin color came back.
customer_reviews.author: marty

product_meta.title: #1 Premium Antarctic Krill Oil Soft Chews for Dogs | Rich in Omega 3 | Astaxanthin | Vitamin E | For Skin and Coat | Low Allergen | Low Calorie | cGMP Certified | Made in USA | 60 Savory Soft Chews
feature_bullets: *LOW ALLERGEN & LOW CALORIE SHED-FREE FORMULA, Tru-Krill soft chews contains a synergistic blend of low allergen ingredients that can help reduce or eliminate shedding while providing your pet with a healthier and shinier coat. Gluten-free and no corn, wheat or soy.

*SUPERIOR SOURCE OF OMEGA-3 AND OMEGA-6, Unlike fish oil, Antarctic krill oil has a phospholipid carrier that helps your pet absorb fatty acids better. Tru-Krill's formula optimizes the Omega-3 to Omega-6 ratio for a healthier treat.
FREE OF INDUSTRIAL POLLUTANTS, Tru-Krill is guaranteed to be free of industrial pollutants and toxins such as mercury, PCBs, and heavy metals.
*KRILL OIL CONTAINS NATURAL ASTAXANTHIN, king of carotenoids, is a powerful antioxidant known to support cardiovascular, cellular, skin and eye health.
WITH ADDED VITAMIN E, which is essential for a dog's muscles, circulatory system, and injury healing. It is also an antioxidant, helping to protect cells from damage caused by free radicals.
